instruction: Facing the end of the bed, take an immediate right, walk past the bathroom and exit the bedroom through the open doorway. Walk straight until you see a large red painting. At the painting make a turn towards 11 o clock and go through the doorway on the left of the painting. Through there, you will reach your destination.
